page.title: 14INDUSTRY
page.content: Ibstock Cattybrook Brick Works of Almondsbury are in modern buildings recently erected on the site of the older works and now employ llO people a few of whom are local. Outside the sheds there are large storage areas, pits from which 9O% of the clay used is dug and clay mounds for storage of clay. The original Cattybrook bricks were used in building the Severn Tunnel as they were impervious to moisture and acid. Now over 4O million bricks and special bricks are made annually. In Pilning, Nortons, a family business employs l8 people manufacturing agricultural implements and machinery Northover Transport, Pilning has 8 employees in the firm using 6 lorries for bulk haulage. The contracts are for coal, grain and quarry aggregates.
